mapper.select:
select rownum,item_key,image01 from (select i.item_key, i.image01 from image i, package p where i.item_key=p.item_key order by d_date desc) where
item_key>#{item01} and #{item02}>item_key and
3>=rownum

select rownum,item_key,image01,item_name,reser from (select i.item_key, i.image01,p.item_name,p.reser from image i, package p where i.item_key=p.item_key and p.item_key>#{item01} and #{item02}>p.item_key order by reser desc) where #{rownum}>=rownum

select rownum,item_key,image01,intro_text,reser from (select i.item_key, i.image01,p.intro_text,p.reser from image i, package p where i.item_key=p.item_key
and p.item_key>#{item01} and #{item02}>p.item_key
order by reser) where 3>=rownum
